Class ClientGameState

java.lang.Object
com.dnikitin.poker.client.ClientGameState
public class ClientGameState extends Object
Represents the mutable state of the client-side game.

This class serves as a data holder synchronized between the network thread (which updates the state based on server messages) and the UI thread (which renders this state to the console).

Thread Safety: Uses ConcurrentHashMap for player data to ensure safe concurrent access. primitive fields are not volatile, assuming updates happen mostly sequentially from the server listener.

      public ClientGameState()

  • Method Details

    • updatePlayerInfo

      public void updatePlayerInfo(String id, String name, int chips)
      Updates or adds a player's information in the local state.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique player ID.
      name - The display name of the player (can be null if not updating).
      chips - The chip count (if negative, the value is ignored).

    • deductChips

      public void deductChips(String id, int amount)
      Deducts a specific amount of chips from a player.
      Parameters:
      id - The player ID.
      amount - The amount to subtract.

    • addChips

      public void addChips(String id, int amount)
      Adds a specific amount of chips to a player.
      Parameters:
      id - The player ID.
      amount - The amount to add.

    • setConnectionInfo

      public void setConnectionInfo(String gameId, String playerId)
      Sets the session identifiers upon joining a game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The game session ID.
      playerId - The player's assigned ID.

    • updateRoundInfo

      public void updateRoundInfo(int pot, int highestBet)
      Updates the global round information such as pot size and highest bet.
      Parameters:
      pot - The current total pot.
      highestBet - The current highest bet on the table.

    • updatePhase

      public void updatePhase(String phase)
      Updates the current game phase.
      Parameters:
      phase - The new phase name.

    • updateTurnInfo

      public void updateTurnInfo(int toCall)
      Updates the betting requirements for the current player's turn.
      Parameters:
      toCall - The amount required to call the current bet.

    • updateMyHand

      public void updateMyHand(String cardsString)
      Parses and updates the player's hand from a string representation.
      Parameters:
      cardsString - A comma-separated string of cards (e.g., "Ah,Ks,2d") or special tokens like "NONE"/"HIDDEN".

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the entire game state to default values. Usually called when leaving a game or when a critical error occurs.

    • getPlayerName

      public String getPlayerName(String id)
      Resolves a player ID to a display name.
      Parameters:
      id - The player ID.
      Returns:
      "You" if the ID matches the local player, the player's name if known, or the ID itself as a fallback.

    • getMyName

      public String getMyName()
      Gets the local player's display name.
      Returns:
      The name or "Unknown" if not set.

    • getMyChips

      public int getMyChips()
      Gets the local player's current chip count.
      Returns:
      Chip count or 0 if unknown.
